悪友: (あくゆう) - undesirable friend/bad company/bad companion/bad influence; partner in crime (i.e. good friend)/close friend/buddy
悪口: (わるぐち) - abuse; insult; slander; evil speaking; bad mouth
悪口を言う: (わるくちをいう) - to insult; to say something insulting about; to bad-mouth
悪口雑言: (あっこうぞうごん) - (yoji) all kinds of malicious gossip; heaping verbal abuse (on); cursing and swearing (words)
悪名: (あくめい) - bad reputation; ill repute; bad name
悪名高い: (あくみょうだかい) - infamous; notorious
悪因: (あくいん) - (ant: 善因) root of evil; bad cause
悪因悪果: (あくいんあっか) - (yoji) sowing and reaping evil
悪声: (あくせい) - bad voice; evil speaking
悪夢から覚める: (あくむからさめる) - to come to one's senses
悪女: (あくじょ) - wicked or ugly woman
悪妻は百年の不作: (あくさいはひゃくねんのふさく) - a bad wife spells the ruin of her husband; a bad wife means a hundred years of bad luck to her husband
悪巧み: (わるだくみ) - wiles; sinister design; trick; conspiracy; intrigue
悪巫山戯: (わるふざけ) - prank; practical joke; horseplay; mischievous trick
悪平等: (あくびょうどう) - misguided equality; misconceived equality; leaning over backwards to be impartial
悪影響を及ぼす: (あくえいきょうをおよぼす) - to affect adversely; to have a negative influence (on)
悪役: (あくやく) - villain; baddie; the villain's part
悪徳商法: (あくとくしょうほう) - (yoji) unscrupulous (crooked, fraudulent) business practices; pernicious sales methods
悪徳弁護士: (あくとくべんごし) - shyster; pettifogger; unscrupulous lawyer; crooked lawyer
悪徳政治家: (あくとくせいじか) - corrupt politician
悪徳新聞: (あくとくしんぶん) - irresponsible newspaper
悪念: (あくねん) - evil thought; malicious motive; spite
悪性: (あくせい) - malignancy; virulence; malignant (cancer); pernicious (anemia, anaemia)
悪性リンパしゅ: (あくせいリンパしゅ) - malignant lymphoma
悪性リンパ腫: (あくせいリンパしゅ) - malignant lymphoma
悪性新生物: (あくしょうしんせいぶつ) - malignant growth
悪性水腫: (あくせいすいしゅ) - malignant edema; malignant oedema
悪性腫瘍: (あくせいしゅよう) - malignant tumor; malignant tumour
悪性貧血: (あくせいひんけつ) - pernicious anemia; pernicious anaemia
悪性黒色腫: (あくせいこくしょくしゅ) - malignant melanoma
悪怯れる: (わるびれる) - to be timid; to be shy
悪意: (あくい) - ill will/spite/evil intention/malice; bad meaning; {law}  mala fides/bad faith/criminal intent to deceive; {law} malice
悪意占有: (あくいせんゆう) - {law}  mala fide possession
悪感: (あくかん) - ill feeling; ill will; antipathy; animosity
悪感情: (あっかんじょう) - ill feeling; ill will; animosity; bad impression
悪態をつく: (あくたいをつく) - to call a person names; to curse
悪戦: (あくせん) - hard fighting; close contest
悪戦苦闘: (あくせんくとう) - (yoji) hard fighting; hard struggle; fighting against heavy odds
悪戯っ子: (いたずらっこ) - mischievous child/scamp/rascal; elf/imp
悪戯坊主: (いたずらぼうず) - (yoji) mischievous boy; troublemaker; pesky kids
悪戯子: (いたずらっこ) - mischievous child/scamp/rascal; elf/imp
悪戯書: (いたずらがき) - scribbling; doodling; graffiti
悪戯書き: (いたずらがき) - scribbling; doodling; graffiti
悪戯者: (いたずらもの) - mischief-maker/trickster/prankster; lascivious person (esp. a loose woman); useless fellow; mouse/rat
悪戯電話: (いたずらでんわ) - crank call; prank phone call
悪所: (あくしょ) - dangerous area/perilous road; red-light district/house of ill repute/brothel
悪推量: (わるずいりょう) - distrust; unjust suspicion
悪文: (あくぶん) - bad style; poor writing
悪木盗泉: (あくぼくとうせん) - (yoji) A virtuous person does (should) not commit an act that offends his moral principles no matter how hard pressed he may be
悪材料: (あくざいりょう) - adverse stock-market factors
悪条件: (あくじょうけん) - unfavorable conditions; unfavourable conditions
悪業: (あくぎょう) - (あくごう is used esp. in Buddhism) (ant: 善業) evil deed; sinful deed; bad karma
悪気: (わるぎ) - ill will; malice; evil intent; ill feeling; distrust
